column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Update: Â After my last review of Bavette's I received an apologetic email from one of the managing partners. At first
column2: the skeptic in me deemed it to be lip service. However
column3: after exchanging several messages it was clear the gentleman was authentic and Bavette's was genuinely interested in providing great service and somehow making it right. He did some investigating to check out what happened and got back to me. After refusing the offer of a gift card and another go... our bill for that evening was adjusted
column4: which we did not ask be done. It was a very nice surprise
column5: and one that made us feel cared for.
